properties.title: Woodlands Road Cemetery, Gillingham
properties.description: Woodlands Cemetery, Woodlands Road, Gillingham, Kent, ME7 2DXInformation This cemetery is run and maintained by Medway Council, which is committed to providing a first class service and improving the appearance and safety of its cemeteries. More information can be found about the choices available when considering purchasing a grave, the aftercare of graves and the provision of memorials by following the web link below.Opening hours March to October: Monday – Saturday: 8am – 6pm, Sunday: 10am – 6pm / November to February: Monday – Saturday: 8am – 4pm, Sunday: 10am – 4pm / All public holidays: as Sunday More information: http://www.medway.gov.uk/communityandliving/birthdeathandmarriage/deathfuneralsandcremation/burials/cemeteries.aspxEmail crematorium.cemeteries@medway.gov.uk
